programme.title: Bike World
programme.desc: Bike World revolves around the speedway and the racers swishing by on their two wheelers. Find out the latest news and reports regarding two-wheel competitions in the world of speed. This is the content to enjoy for all motorcycle enthusiasts across the world. Explore the best motorbikes, top locations, and iconic racers who have a lot of fun doing it.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Exciting sports show that follows the hottest action from the world's most unique motor sport events. Viewers will have a chance to visit some interesting competitions- from IDEMITSU 600 Super Endurance at the Chang Interna-tional Circuit in Thailand, the winter edition of the Maroc Challenge in Morocco, to the Hispania Rally, the only European rally to take place in the desert, and many more. Viewers will also find out all the news from the world of motor sports.

programme.title: Perfect Ride S6
programme.desc: What's hot and what's not. There are quests to be undertaken, the search for the ideal auto, for the perfect race track for the ultimate accessory gadget. What are the preferred rides of the race legends?

programme.title: Supercars S6
programme.desc: There are details which set super cars apart from normal cars and these details are essential. Super cars are the biggest, loudest and most expensive cars on the highway; they're four-wheeled works of arts.

programme.title: Electric Pickups
programme.desc: Pickups are the epitome of the american way of drive! High displacement V8 engines combined with plenty of space. Seldom seen in Europe, they are the cashcows of many automakers in the US market. In the future traditional manufacturers will hardly be able to avoid an electric versoin of their trucks. And the competition is getting bigger and bigger. Ever since Elon Musk presented the Tesla Cybertruck bothe the established brands and new startups had been on the advance to conquer the market with vehicles that have the equivalent of over 1000 hp. Ford F-150 Ligtning, Bollinger B2 or Hummer EV - Go Green shows what we can expect in the next few years.

programme.title: Spotted
programme.desc: With its Model S, American carmaker Tesla wants to establish electric engines in the full size class. For the very first time it is possible to attain driving ranges over 400 kilometers. Its tremendous acceleration becomes an image boost for the brand. Porsche stands for lots of speed and horsepower, too. With its Panamera Sport Turismo, the sports car manufacturer taps into a new market.

programme.title: Red Gold Dream
programme.desc: This years motto of the Conti Tuning Day is 'power sedans' and Tuning host Lucy examines the bolides carefully. Plus: The McLaren SLR is the masterpiece of Mercedes, a super sports car among all sports cars. Only 3.500 units have been produced. Tunings showcases the most expensive SLR in the world, which outshines all other SLR models.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (The First Time) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «The First Time»The Stunt Heroes from the Action Concept are shooting a car rollover. But stunt coordinator Carl wants to go the whole hog. His motto: if you're going to do something at all, you might as well do it properly! Thus, he throws an exciting shootout into the mix. He also has a surprise for his boss. During the rollover he wants Uwe to sit in the passenger seat â?" for the very first time!

programme.title: Supercars S6
programme.desc: Around the world, the Mercedes S-Class is considered to be one of the most elegant and luxurious limousines. Now the S-Class treads new paths and presents itself topless for the very first time. It's large and heavy, but as an AMG Model also pretty damn quick and blessed with wonderful V8 sound. On the contrary, the Camaro coupe rather wants to be a bad boy than a classy cruiser. It's truly an exotic model, but also one of the cheapest coupes with a V8 engine.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: Circuit de Spa-Francorchamps, Belgium
programme.desc: The European Le Mans Series, a series open to Le Mans Prototypes and grand tourer-style racing cars, is back with another action-filled season. This year's calendar features six 4-hour races around Europe including the return of the 4 Hours of Imola.

programme.title: AWD Safari Challenge
programme.desc: Watch the exciting Safari Championship organized by the British All Wheel Drive Club, in which modified 4x4 vehicles of all brands can participate.

programme.title: Hi-Tec Drift Allstars Series Australia
programme.desc: The latest drifting competition on Motorvision.TV brings you the best drifters from Australia. Join us for thrilling duels, smoking wheels and non-stop drift battles for the Drift All Stars Series title.

programme.title: Anaheim Race 1
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: Icelandic Formula Offroad
programme.desc: The Icelandic Formula Off-Road is one of the most extreme racing series in the world and demands everything from the teams and their specially built vehicles. Nearly vertical cliffs have to be climbed, demanding time challenges have to be solved or spectacular aquaplaning stunts have to be performed.

programme.title: Top Fuel Australia Championship
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: National Legend Cars
programme.desc: The Legends Cars National Championship brings back racing from yesteryear. The series features 5/8 scale replicas of pre-war 1930s Fords, Chevys and Dodges that are equipped with 125bhp-motorcycle engines. These cars are well known for delivering high-octane battles on race tracks around Great Britain.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (The Examination) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «The Examination»This is what it looks like when the Stunt Heroes from Action Concept perform a long jump: A vehicle jumps at full speed over four cars, which explode one after the other. It's a matter of precision and timing. Up-and-coming stuntwoman Tina has to prove, what she can do. It's a spectacular, action-packed stunt with guaranteed bruising!

programme.title: Supercars S6
programme.desc: The Lamborghini Huracan is brutal. Its V10 naturally aspirated engine produces 610 hp and catapults the Italian fighting bull from 0 to 100 km/h in 3.1 seconds. But some people think that that's not enough power. The Swiss tuning company O.CT turns the bull into a furious beast. After a complex compressor modification, the Huracán outputs more than 800 hp. The Cadillac CTS-V is under pressure from the get-go. At first glance it's a despicable limousine, but at second glance, it's a true beast. It's supercharged 6.2 Liter V8 engine generates a maximum torque of 855 Nm and allows a maximum speed of 320 km/h.

programme.title: Classic Ride S3
programme.desc: The 1952 Cadillac Fleetwood is also known as the American Rolls-Royce, because it's the car of celebrities, presidents, millionaires and mafia bosses. Only around 16,000 units were built, so it's a treasured collector's piece. One owner of the 52 Cadillac is German-American actor and entertainer Ron Williams, who has a special relationship with the car.

programme.title: Episode 25
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya, Spain
programme.desc: The European Le Mans Series, a series open to Le Mans Prototypes and grand tourer-style racing cars, is back with another action-filled season. This year's calendar features six 4-hour races around Europe including the return of the 4 Hours of Imola.

programme.title: German Touring Championship 1995
programme.desc: Exciting, brutal and thrilling. The 1995 German Touring Car Championships. And with powerful races - also successful on the international stage. Mercedes driver Bernd Schneider dominated and won the title.

programme.title: Jim Clark - The Flying Scotsman
programme.desc: Flying Scotsman.

programme.title: Le Mans Classic
programme.desc: The Le Mans Classic is a vintage sports car event that took place for the first time in 2002 on the site of the 24-hour race of Le Mans. All participating drivers are at a top level as far as driving is concerned.

programme.title: Classic Ride S3
programme.desc: The Mercedes 300SL might be the most exciting sports car of the post-war era. A panel of judges even named it the sports car of the century. Hans Kleissl from Polling near Munich owns one of the world's leading repair and restoration shops for SL models. Classic Ride accompanies him and his 300SL, originally owned by playboy Porfiro Rubirosa, to the Classic Days at Schloss Dyck.

programme.title: Chateau Impney Hill Climb
programme.desc: Motorsports has been taken place at the Château Impney near Droitwich Spa in Worcestershire, England since the 1950s. But no event was as big and successful as the Chateau Impney Hill Climb. Every year, the event attracts a wide array of vintage cars and more modern supercars. However, 2019 sees the last edition of the iconic Chateau Impney Hill Climb.

programme.title: Manthey Racing
programme.desc: Racing in the Green Hell.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (Car Action Highlights) S2 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Car Action Highlights»Ther are million ways to destroy a car: Crashes, flips and jumps. We show the highlights of this seasons car stunts.

programme.title: Supercars S2
programme.desc: A Ferrari is tight, impractical and can only be used in the sunshine on dry roads. These times are now finally over. The Ferrari FF, the first family-friendly GT sports car - with 4-wheel drive, V12 engine and 660 hp.

programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: Championnat de Belgique des Rallyes
programme.desc: BRC.

programme.title: Azores Rallye, Portugal
programme.desc: Amazing challenge around Europe includes 19 special stages. The top crew will become Tour European Rally champion in one of the most beautiful European rallies.

programme.title: Tour European Rally Historic
programme.desc: Motorvision TV brings you all the action from the independent rally series taking place around Europe.

programme.title: Rali Vinho da Madeira
programme.desc: Founded in 1959, the Rali Vinho da Madeira is one of the biggest annual sporting events on the Portuguese Island of Madeira. In 2020, the rally consists of seven sections across the island and attracts thousands of people each year to enjoy the beautiful landscapes and to watch the participants competing on hilly terrain.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (The Remote Control) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «The Remote Control»The Stunt Heroes from Action Concept try out another new stunt: Stuntman Tobi, aka Heidi, operates an Artega GT at full speed with a remote control. This is, however, just a warm-up before the big stunt, in which he drives a car up a steep ramp at 68 mph. The Question is: How high can remote control cars fly? It's an action-packed flying spectacle!

programme.title: Supercars S3
programme.desc: They are sleek, they are exclusive and most of all: they are extremely fast - supercars! See the first Arabian supercar and many other brand new luxury sport cars from the Qatar Motor Show.

programme.title: Classic Ride S5
programme.desc: For more than 50 years the Porsche 911 has been driving on the roads and race tracks of the world. Each generation set standards in the sports car segment. We look back at the beginnings of this success story. But it is not the only legend from the class of 1963. At the same time Corvette Stingray celebrates its premier and becomes the American sports car dream par excellence.
